headline: Why Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (BMY) Went Down On Friday?
summary: We recently published a list of Friday’s 10 Worst Performing Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) stands against other Friday’s worst performing stocks. Wall Street’s main indices bounced back on Friday, erasing the entire week’s losses, as investor hopes were fueled by news that no […]
